com.philips.cdp.registration

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.cdp.registration.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    User class represents information related to a logged in user of User Registration component. Additionally, it exposes APIs to login, logout and refresh operations for traditional and social accounts.
